subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: For more than 57 minutes, the Utah offense had been dormant. But quarterback Brian Johnson’s 9-yard touchdown pass to Freddie Brown with 47.9 seconds left rallied the Utes.
snippet: For more than 57 minutes, the Utah offense had been dormant. But quarterback Brian Johnson’s 9-yard touchdown pass to Freddie Brown with 47.9 seconds left rallied the Utes.
